name: Virtual Network Lab
shortDescription: The following paper looks at the available options in creating a virtualized network lab for use by students and professors alike to create a safe, destructible environment from which to learn networking. For hypervisors, a review of various hypervisors was taken. Hypervisors included in the survey are Microsoft Hyper-V, Citrix Xen, Xen.Org, Marionnet, and VMWare. Following will be a short conclusion offering a proposed solution to the lab.
